Title: Prohibits a business from limiting access to its public restrooms to paying customers of such business
Summary: Prohibits a business from limiting access to its public restrooms to paying customers of such business; provides that a violation shall be subject to a civil penalty in the amount of five hundred dollars.
LawCode: Add ยง399-ii, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to access to public restrooms
